奌字的基本解释

奌
diǎn
古同“点”。

奌字的汉语字典释义

[①]［diǎn］
［《廣韻》多忝切，上忝，端。］
亦作“奌1”。“点1”的繁体字。
(1)小黑点。亦指小的痕迹。
(2)辱；污。
(3)涂抹、灭去。
(4)汉字的一种笔画。即“丶”。
(5)加点断句。
(6)点缀。
(7)中；着。
(8)加点标明。
(9)评论。参见“嗤點”、“指點”。
(10)液体小滴。
(11)古代夜间的计时单位。一夜分五更，一更分五点。
(12)现代计时单位。一昼夜分为二十四点。
(13)滴注，下落。
(14)检验；查点。
(15)指点；启示。
(16)征调。
(17)蘸。
(18)乐器名。一种悬空敲击的乐器。形如小铜鼓，中间隆起，两边有孔系绳。用于报时，或用于合乐，击之以显节拍。
(19)乐器名。一种特制响器，两端作云状，名为云板，也称点。旧时邸宅、官署以击点为集众报事的信号。
(20)节奏，节拍。
(21)燃点。
(22)点化。
(23)围棋术语。点眼。
(24)冲；泡。
(25)委放；选授。

奌字的康熙字典解释
奌字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
奌字的起名意思

暂无。

奌
Basic explanation of words
奌
diǎn
The ancient same "point".
奌
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［diǎn］
["Guangyun" is very cut, up and down. ]
Also known as "奌1". Traditional characters of "点1".
(1) Little black dots. Also refers to small traces.
(2) Humiliation; pollution.
(3) Smear and wipe off.
(4) A stroke of Chinese characters. That is, "Dian".
(5) Add some sentence breaks.
(6) Embellishment.
(7) In; With.
(8) Add points to indicate.
(9) Comments. See "chi point", "point to point".
(10) Liquid droplets.
(11) The unit of time at night in ancient times. One night is divided into five shifts, and one shift is divided into five points.
(12) Modern time unit. A day and a night are divided into twenty-four points.
(13) Drip, drop.
(14) Inspection; check points.
(15) Pointing; Enlightenment.
(16) Requisition.
(17) Dip.
(18) The name of the instrument. A percussion instrument in the air. It is shaped like a small bronze drum with a bulge in the middle and a tether with holes on both sides. Used for telling the time, or for playing together, hit it to show the beat.
(19) The name of the instrument. A special sound damping device with a cloud shape at both ends, called a cloud board, also called a dot. The old mansions and government offices used hit points as a signal to gather reports.
(20) Rhythm, beat.
(21) Burning point.
(22) Enlightenment.
(23) Go terms. Nod.
(24) Brew; bubble.
(25) Delegate; elect.
奌

奌
